content: पुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पृ-क] Full of, filled with. --रं {@--1@} A town, city (containing large buildings, surrounded by a ditch, and not less than one Krośa in extent); पुरे तावंतमेवास्य तनोति रविरातपं <ls>Ku. 2. 33</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 59.</ls> {@--2@} A castle, fortress, stronghold. {@--3@} A house, residence, abode. {@--4@} The body. {@--5@} The female apartments. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of the town पाटलिपुत्र. <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--7@} The calyx of a flower, or any cup formed of leaves. {@--8@} A brothel. {@--9@} The skin. {@--10@} Bdellium. {@--11@} An upper story. {@--12@} A store-house. {@--13@} A fragrant grass (नागरमुस्ता).
